Banner.Title: Decentralized Perpetual contracts
Banner.Info: A perpetual contracts exchange that mining through holding positions

Features.Title: Features and Differences
Features.Info1: Holding position is providing liquidity. Hold position to get mining rewards and DRF tokens.
Features.Info2: The visible price is the settled price, no price slippage or deviation cost.
Features.Info3: Unlike traditional CEX, no Funding Fee, holding positions no longer incur additional cost.
Features.Info4: Price are provided by external oracles, no liquidity squeeze caused by the system
Features.Info5: All major functions run by smart contracts
Features.Info6: A decentralized derivative protocol that is created, operated and owned by DAO

DEXaas.Title: DEXaas: DEX-as-a-service
DEXaas.Info: Derify is not operated by a centralized team but individual Brokers all over the world. Every user needs a Broker to access Derify, including but not limited to trading, mining, governance. etc. This is so-called DEXaas (DEX-as-a-Service) model. Brokers can use Derify Protocol to create a derivative DEX of their own and provide products and services to their users. Derify cores are shared with every Brokers' derivative DEX, including liquidity pool, insurance pool, risk control system and profit (30% of the total trading fees and DRF token rewards)

Dao.Title: Other Contributors in Derify DAO
Dao.Info2: Maintain the community order in different language channels, and create a positive & active atmosphere
Dao.Info3: Provide materials and contents for branding
Dao.Info4: Arbitrager, liquidator and other community developer to maintain system stability

Roadmap.Title: Roadmap
Roadmap.Name1Sub3: Received hundreds of thousands dollars in seed round
Roadmap.Name2Sub2: Completed the development of Alpha version
Roadmap.Name2Sub4: Participated in Solana Hackathon and winning prize in Asian region
Roadmap.Name4Sub2: Launched IDO and began DRF token release in DEX
Roadmap.Name5Sub4: Airdrop and begin the genesis mining
Roadmap.Name6Sub2: Dive deep in BNB chain ecosystem
Roadmap.Name6Sub3: Recruit more global brokers and organize continuous community activities
Roadmap.Name7Sub4: Support more derivatives trading and higher leverage
